sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_8e713a9247c5f11021f49128436d4329
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Car parking reservation">f64205c54709711021f49128436d433a</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:0115ecf54701711021f49128436d43f0</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Check เวลาเริ่มต้น มากกว่าสิ้นสุด</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    g_form.clearValue('u_end_dt');
    g_form.clearValue('u_price');
    g_form.clearValue('u_hours');

    var st = g_form.getValue('u_start_dt');
    var ed = g_form.getValue('u_end_dt');

    if (ed !== "") {
        if (st > ed) {
			g_form.showFieldMsg("u_start_dt", "ห้ามเลือกวันที่ที่ผ่านมา", "error");
            g_form.clearValue('u_start_dt');
        }
    }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-09-05 14:01:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>8e713a9247c5f11021f49128436d4329</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Check เวลาเริ่มต้น มากกว่าสิ้นสุด</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Car parking reservation" source="x_950909_car_park">083c1ad84741311021f49128436d4349</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Car parking reservation">083c1ad84741311021f49128436d4349</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_8e713a9247c5f11021f49128436d4329</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-06 05:25:25</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
